name: Holiday Inn Express Singapore Orchard Road
description:
Property Location
With a stay at Holiday Inn Express Singapore Orchard Road, you'll be centrally located in Singapore, steps from Takashimaya Shopping Centre and minutes from Paragon Shopping Centre. This hotel is close to Chinatown Heritage Center and Haji Lane.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 221 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and iPod docking stations. 40-inch LCD televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Holiday Inn Express Singapore Orchard Road, or stop in at a snack bar/deli. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a computer station, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Singapore? This hotel has facilities measuring 215 square feet (20 square meters), including a meeting room. Free self parking is available onsite.
